name: wordmap-zeitgeist
description: A real-time visualization of the internet's zeitgeist through word frequency analysis from various news sources and tech feeds.

scripts.check: npm run check:frontend && npm run check:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.dev: echo 'Run npm run dev:frontend and npm run dev:backend in separate terminals'
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
